feed.title: Time to add CSFS to Signet?

entry.title: Time to add CSFS to Signet?
entry.summary: The email highlights a technical issue regarding the CSFS (Commitment Signed Fixed Sequence) implemented in mutinynet, pointing out that it does not comply with BIP348 standards. The significance of this non-compliance for experimenters remains unclear, suggesting that while it may not be critical for all users, adherence to standards is deemed important by the sender. To address this issue, the sender has taken proactive steps by opening a Pull Request (PR) on inquisition, aiming to introduce BIP348-compatible PRs. This initiative suggests an effort to align mutinynet's features with established Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs), ensuring it meets the community and technical standards expected within the Bitcoin development ecosystem.
